name: penultimate_refraction
description:
⚠️Seizure and epilepsy warning⚠️

I shall refract myself, yes, I shall no longer be known as the prism.

— Bruce Dickinson

This piece was hand-drawn (with mouse and stylus) and animated using Aseprite. Its seamless loop consists 192 frames. Each frame lasts 42 milliseconds. The colors are derived from the PICO-8 palette and use of opacity blending. 576x576. 14.1MB.
